story_idea: As summer ends, the boys go camping. Luke forages wild mushrooms, picks wrong ones. Eats them, becomes a woman. A hidden spirit takes over her mind, awakening lust and control. Luke tries to resist, but spirit conquers each friend, turning them into its playthings. The entity's power grows stronger, using them for sex and domination, while Luke, trapped in his female form, struggles to break free and stop the impending sexual chaos.
